Uses of Class
stockmarketsim.Trader

    • Uses of Trader in stockmarketsim

      Subclasses of Trader in stockmarketsim 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IntelligentTrader
      A trader which attempts to make a profit on the market, rather than by randomly buying and selling
      class  RandomTrader
      An implementation of a random trader, designed to emulate the random noise in a stock market
      Methods in stockmarketsim that return Trader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Trader[] StockMarket.getTraders()
      Returns all traders that're trading on the market
      Methods in stockmarketsim with parameters of type Trader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StockMarket.setTraders(Trader[] traders)
      Sets the traders that are operating on this stock market
